e_prompt: Scroll to choose the three categories with the greatest impact - one at a time. Watch your meters and the categories to view the impact on sustainability and ADM's leverage.

missedThree.e_title: None of those 3 had the greatest impact
missedThree.e_text: Gotta pick new choices. Try again!

missedTwo.e_text: But you need to find the other two

missedOne.e_text: You've almost got it. Can you find the correct third choice?
